revised_title: Preliminary Report of the Biological Results of a Cruise in H.M.S. 'Valorous' to Davis Strait in 1875
tldr: This article discusses the biological findings from a cruise in H.M.S. 'Valorous' to Davis Strait in 1875. The author, J. Gwyn Jeffreys, reports on the specimens collected, including a new diatom species, and the marine life observed during the journey. The article also details the challenges faced during the expedition and the scientific collaboration with other Arctic ships.
